code: import React from'react';import{Wallet,LogOut}from'lucide-react';import useTonConnect from'../hooks/useTonConnect';import useTelegramWebApp from'../hooks/useTelegramWebApp';import'./WalletConnection.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WalletConnection=()=>{const{isConnected,isLoading,wallet,connectWallet,disconnectWallet}=useTonConnect();const{hapticFeedback}=useTelegramWebApp();const handleConnect=async()=>{hapticFeedback('medium');await connectWallet();};const handleDisconnect=async()=>{hapticFeedback('light');await disconnectWallet();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wallet-connection-header",children:!isConnected?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"connect-wallet-btn-header",onClick:handleConnect,disabled:isLoading,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Wallet,{size:16}),isLoading?'Connecting...':'Connect']}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"disconnect-btn-header",onClick:handleDisconnect,disabled:isLoading,title:"Connected: ".concat(wallet===null||wallet===void 0?void 0:wallet.formattedAddress),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Wallet,{size:16}),"Connected",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LogOut,{size:14})]})});};export default WalletConnection;
